history.content: Whether you can take 47A is case-by-case. Denero will post a survey in the first few weeks of cs61a for those interested in cs47a instead. Whether you'll get in is based on your prior programming/cs experience. For instance, other cs classes that you've taken at Cal or elsewhere and any experience you may have through jobs or personal projects.

Hi I am going to take cs47a next Fall since I took cs88( I’m trying to go for cs88+data 8+ 47a path as a substitution for cs 61a). I checked the cs47a course website and it says the prerequisite for the course is 61b. Would it be fine to take 47a and 61b concurrently, or should I take 61bl over this Summer in order to take 47A?

Thank you very much
history.subject: CS 47A prerequisites
